definition: asylum/shelter/to shield/to put under protection/to take under one's wing

sentences.english: Asylum seeker numbers in Australia have reached 6900.
sentences.chinese: 此外，在澳寻求庇护者的人数已达6900人。

sentences.english: The BLOs provide short-term shelter and can provide medical care.
sentences.chinese: 这些边境联络处提供短期的庇护和医疗。

sentences.english: Even strangers who were not Jews, could run to them for safety.
sentences.chinese: 连非犹太人的寄居者，也可以跑到逃城寻求庇护。

sentences.english: During the English Civil War the Channel Isle of Jersey remained loyal to the Crown and gave sanctuary to the King.
sentences.chinese: 在英国内战海峡泽西岛仍忠于官方和庇护了国王。

sentences.english: That inturn may harm animals that depend on the trees for food or shelter.
sentences.chinese: 那一个内弯可能伤害为食物或庇护所仰赖树的动物。

sentences.english: Safe havens have also afforded the militants endless opportunities to find new recruits.
sentences.chinese: 安全庇护所也为武装分子提供无限的机会去招募新兵。

sentences.english: Uzma Mehboob worked as a program manager when the shelter was for women.
sentences.chinese: 乌玛是这里还是庇护所时的项目经理之一。

sentences.english: A country can only exercise the right of asylum in its own territory.
sentences.chinese: 一个国家只能在自己的领土内行使庇护权。

sentences.english: We have set up early warning systems for frosts and shelters for animals.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经建立了霜冻预警系统，为动物建立了庇护所。

sentences.english: One of the shells landed on the breastwork of our shelter and did not explode.
sentences.chinese: 其中的一枚落在我们的庇护所的胸墙上。

sentences.english: Let me do not pray to get the asylum in the inclemency.
sentences.chinese: 让我不要祈祷在险恶中得到庇护。

sentences.english: Sham tax shelters sold by large accounting firms to partner companies.
sentences.chinese: 被大会计公司卖与公司合伙的假税庇护所。

sentences.english: My might would shadow the world;
sentences.chinese: 我的豪气可以庇护天下。

sentences.english: Pamela Curr is a campaign strategist for the Asylum Resource Center in Melbourne.
sentences.chinese: 科尔是寻求庇护者资源中心的战略专家。

sentences.english: So, Danny has moved in with her and out of the shelter on Rose Street.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼也搬出了罗斯街的庇护所，跟着妈妈一起住。

sentences.english: The church gave shelter to people on winter nights.
sentences.chinese: 这个教堂在冬天的夜晚给人们提供庇护。

definition: to give shade (of a tree etc)/to shield
to help one another/to come to sb's help
to rely on sb for protection
to care for/to show concern for/to think longingly (of one's country)
to take care/to keep an eye on/to look after/to tell/to remind
to rely on help from sb
